level.heading: Withdrawal on dissolution or conversion to nonfiling entity other than limited liability partnership.

level.text: A foreign entity registered to do business in the District which dissolves or converts to a domestic or foreign nonfiling entity other than a limited liability partnership shall deliver a statement of withdrawal to the Mayor for filing. The statement shall state:
The name of the foreign entity and the name of the jurisdiction under whose law it was formed before the dissolution or conversion;
The type of entity that the foreign entity was before the dissolution or conversion;
That the foreign entity surrenders its registration to do business in the District as a qualified entity; and
If the foreign entity has converted to a foreign nonfiling entity other than a foreign limited liability partnership:
The type of nonfiling entity to which it has converted and the jurisdiction whose laws govern its internal affairs;
That the foreign entity revokes the authority of its registered agent to accept service on its behalf; and
A mailing address to which service of process may be made under subsection (b) of this section.

After the withdrawal under this section of a foreign filing entity that has converted to a foreign nonfiling entity is effective, service of process in any proceeding based on a cause of action arising during the time it was registered to do business in the District may be made pursuant to ยง 29-104.12.

After the withdrawal under this section of a foreign filing entity that has converted to a domestic nonfiling entity other than a limited liability partnership is effective, service of process may be made on the nonfiling entity pursuant to ยง 29-104.12.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
